data.lyric:
[ti:Glad You Exist]
[ar:Dan + Shay]
[al:Glad You Exist]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Glad You Exist - Dan + Shay
[00:02.57]Lyrics by：Dan Smyers/Jordan Reynolds/Ryan Lewis/Shay Mooney/Tayla Parx
[00:05.15]Here's to all the late night drunk phone calls that you picked up
[00:09.23]
[00:09.74]Here's to all the bad decisions that you didn't judge
[00:14.33]All the "love yous" and the "hate yous" and
[00:16.12]The secrets that you told me
[00:19.00]Here's to everyone but mostly us
[00:22.11]
[00:22.71]There's a couple billion people in the world
[00:26.63]
[00:27.31]And a million other places we could be but you're here with me
[00:32.57]Take a moment just to take it in
[00:35.85]
[00:36.45]'Cause every high and every low led to this
[00:39.75]I'm just so glad you exist
[00:42.36]
[00:51.23]Hey look what a hello from a stranger turned into
[00:55.28]
[00:55.89]Caught up in a moment like it's just us in this room
[01:00.51]All the right words at the right time
[01:02.29]And you know 'em "cause you know me better than anyone else
[01:07.13]We don't need anyone else
[01:08.87]There's a couple billion people in the world
[01:12.82]
[01:13.41]And a million other places we could be but you're here with me
[01:18.69]Take a moment just to take it in
[01:22.01]
[01:22.57]'Cause every high and every low led to this
[01:25.89]I'm just so glad you exist
[01:28.44]
[01:37.41]Don't you ever go don't you ever go don't you ever go changing
[01:42.06]Never let me go never let me go never let me go baby
[01:46.69]Don't you ever go don't you ever go don't you ever go changing
[01:51.30]Never let me go never ever let me go never let me go baby
[01:55.02]There's a couple billion people in the world
[01:58.94]
[01:59.66]And a million other places we could be but you're here with me
[02:04.83]Take a moment just to take it in
[02:08.05]
[02:08.73]'Cause every high and every low led to this
[02:12.08]I'm just so glad you exist
[02:14.52]
[02:17.22]I'm glad you exist
data.trans:
[ti:Glad You Exist]
[ar:Dan + Shay]
[al:Glad You Exist]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.57]//
[00:05.15]献给你深夜接听的所有醉酒电话
[00:09.23]
[00:09.74]献给你没有横加干涉的错误决定
[00:14.33]献给所有爱你的人 所有恨你的人
[00:16.12]以及你告诉我的秘密
[00:19.00]献给所有人 主要是为了我们
[00:22.11]
[00:22.71]这世界生活着几十亿人
[00:26.63]
[00:27.31]我们可以走遍天涯海角 但是你在我身边
[00:32.57]花一些时间 弄明白这一切
[00:35.85]
[00:36.45]因为每一次跌宕起伏才迎来这样的结果
[00:39.75]我只是庆幸世间有你
[00:42.36]
[00:51.23]看看来自陌生人的问候变成了什么样子
[00:55.28]
[00:55.89]沉浸在美好的时光里 仿佛房间里只有我们俩人
[01:00.51]抓住时机 说着恰合时宜的话
[01:02.29]你了解他们 因为你比任何人都了解我
[01:07.13]我们不需要其他人
[01:08.87]这世界生活着几十亿人
[01:12.82]
[01:13.41]我们可以走遍天涯海角 但是你在我身边
[01:18.69]花一些时间 弄明白这一切
[01:22.01]
[01:22.57]因为每一次跌宕起伏才迎来这样的结果
[01:25.89]我只是庆幸世间有你
[01:28.44]
[01:37.41]请你永远不要 请你永远不要 请你永远不要改变心意
[01:42.06]绝对不要放开我的手 绝对不要放开我的手 绝对不要放开我的手 宝贝
[01:46.69]请你永远不要 请你永远不要 请你永远不要改变心意
[01:51.30]绝对不要放开我的手 永远不要放开我的手 绝对不要放开我的手 宝贝
[01:55.02]这世界生活着几十亿人
[01:58.94]
[01:59.66]我们可以走遍天涯海角 但是你在我身边
[02:04.83]花一些时间 弄明白这一切
[02:08.05]
[02:08.73]因为每一次跌宕起伏才迎来这样的结果
[02:12.08]我只是庆幸世间有你
[02:14.52]
[02:17.22]我庆幸世间有你
